metadata.description: Information about the use of cookies on this website.

title: Cookie policy
intro: This website uses its own and third-party cookies to ensure proper operation and, where applicable, analyze user navigation.

what.title: What are cookies?
what.p1: Cookies are small text files stored on the user's device when visiting a website.

types.title: Types of cookies
types.p1: Technical cookies: necessary for the basic operation of the website.
types.p2: Analytics cookies: allow aggregated analysis of user behavior.

technical.label: Technical cookies
technical.value: Necessary for navigation, security and proper website functioning.

analytics.label: Analytics cookies
analytics.value: Vercel Analytics cookies used only if the user provides consent.

manage.title: Cookie management
manage.p1: Users can accept, reject or configure analytics cookies through the cookie banner.
manage.p2: Consent can be modified at any time using the cookie settings link in the footer.

update.title: Cookie policy updates
update.p1: This policy may be updated to reflect legal or technical changes.
